select t.name as team_name,st.* from join_team as jt inner join team as t on t.id = jt.team_id inner join student as st on jt.stu_id = st.sut_id where 1=1
and jt.team_id=#{teamId}

select st.* from join_activity as jt inner join news as t on t.id = jt.activity_id inner join student as st on jt.stu_id = st.sut_id where 1=1
and jt.activity_id =#{activityId}
select sum(case when sex='0' then 1 else 0 end) as mcount, sum(case when sex='1' then 1 else 0 end) as wcount from student
